name: Trainer 1
Dialogue: Let's go, but don't cheat!

name: Trainer 1 after
Dialogue: I did my best! I have no regrets!

name: Trainer 2
Dialogue: Win, lose or draw!

name: Trainer 2 after
Dialogue: POKEMON is life! And to live is to gamble!

name: Trainer 3
Dialogue: I just became a trainer! But, I think I can win!

name: Trainer 3 after
Dialogue: What do you want? Leave me alone!

name: Trainer 4
Dialogue: My POKEMON should be ready by now!

name: Trainer 4 after
Dialogue: I better go find stronger ones!

name: Trainer 5
Dialogue: Competition! I can't get enough!

name: Trainer 5 after
Dialogue: You can't be a coward in the world of POKEMON!

name: Trainer 6
Dialogue: I have never won before...

name: Trainer 6 after
Dialogue: It's just luck. Luck of the draw.

name: Trainer 7
Dialogue: Careful! I'm laying down some cables!

name: Trainer 7 after
Dialogue: Spread the word to save energy!

name: Trainer 8
Dialogue: Watch out for live wires!

name: Trainer 8 after
Dialogue: Well, better get back to work.

name: Trainer 9
Dialogue: Fwahaha! I have never lost!

name: Trainer 9 after
Dialogue: Luck of the draw! Just luck!

name: Trainer 10
Dialogue: I'm the best in my class!

name: Trainer 10 after
Dialogue:
There's a fat POKEMON that comes down from the mountains.
It's strong if you can get it.

When you catch lots of POKEMON, isn't it hard to think up names?
In LAVENDER TOWN, there's a man who rates POKEMON nicknames.
He'll help you rename them too!

Hi! Remember me? I'm PROF.OAK's AIDE! If you caught 30 kinds of
POKEMON, I'm supposed to give you an ITEMFINDER! So, Player! Have you
 caught at least 30 kinds of POKEMON?
Oh. I see. When you get 30 kinds, come back for ITEMFINDER.

Let's see... Uh-oh! You have caught only <##> kinds of POKEMON!
You need 30 kinds if you want the ITEMFINDER.

Great! You have caught <##> kinds of POKEMON! Congratulations!
Here you go!

There are items on the ground that can't be seen.
ITEMFINDER will detect an item close to you. It can't pinpoint it,
so you have to look yourself!
I'm looking for NIDORINO! Wanna trade one for NIDORINA?
Awww! Oh well...
What? That's not NIDORINO! If you get come, come back here!
Okay, connect the cable like so!
Hey thanks!
